net.sf.fmj.media.codec.audio.ulaw
Class MuLawDecoderUtil

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.fmj.media.codec.audio.ulaw.MuLawDecoderUtil

public class MuLawDecoderUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Turns 8-bit mu-law bytes back into 16-bit PCM values. Adapted from code by Marc Sweetgall at http://www.codeproject.com/csharp/g711audio.asp Note: in .Net, a byte is unsigned, hence the need to always do byte & 0xff - this converts an unsigned byte to the corresponding (nonnegative) int value.

Parameters:
